articles.description: The Portugal living legend has yet to regain his form or match fitness since the restart according to his controversial manager
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo is not physically at his best right now, admits Juventus boss Maurizio Sarri. 
The six-time Ballon dOr winner has been slated for his involvement in Juves penalty shoot-out defeat … [+1756 chars]

articles.author: David Fowler
articles.title: Rangers fan McLean on time he abused ex-Celtic flop Pukki at SUBWAY - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
KENNY McLEAN reckons all he remembers about Teemu Pukkis time in Scotland is the night he abused him in SUBWAY.
Finnish striker Pukki has become the goalscorer for Norwich after flopping at the Hoop… [+2245 chars]
